items.content_html: MappifySQL is a lightweight, easy-to-use Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library for MySQL databases, designed for use with Node.js. It provides an intuitive, promise-based API for interacting with your MySQL database using JavaScript or TypeScript.
items.title: Walidadebayo/MappifySQL: MappifySQL is a lightweight, easy-to-use Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library for MySQL databases, designed for use with Node.js. It provides an intuitive, promise-based API for interacting with your MySQL database using JavaScript or TypeScript.
